ModMetaData.name: Cell Stability Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds 3 genes that improve cell stability because sometimes you want a pawn to have a longer lifespan than normal, not shorter.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url] [url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/CellStabilityGenes][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
